name: Aurora Football Field
shortDescription: Full-size outdoor pitch with evening lighting and a modern locker zone.
description: Aurora Football Field is designed for competitive 11v11 matches and structured training sessions. The surface is a hybrid grass system with consistent bounce, and the LED floodlights provide excellent visibility after sunset.

name: Elite Football Ground
shortDescription: High-quality turf with night lighting and locker facilities.
description: Elite Football Ground is designed for professional matches and training sessions. It features premium turf and excellent lighting for evening games.

name: Zenith Tennis Court
shortDescription: Premium hard court with adjustable net height and ball machine support.
description: Zenith Tennis Court is a competition-grade hard court with clear line visibility and reliable drainage. The facility includes a practice wall and optional ball machine rental during booking.

name: Champion Tennis Court
shortDescription: Top-tier hard court with advanced drainage and lighting.
description: Champion Tennis Court offers a professional-grade hard surface, ideal for tournaments and advanced practice. Includes night lighting and a seating area.

name: Iron Hub Gym Studio
shortDescription: Private strength studio with racks, sled track, and smart timers.
description: Iron Hub is a bookable studio for focused training. It includes two power racks, bumper plates, kettlebells, and a short indoor sled track. The studio is ideal for small groups who want privacy and predictable equipment access.

name: Skyline Basketball Court
shortDescription: Indoor court with scoreboard, bleachers, and premium hardwood.
description: Skyline Basketball Court offers a tournament-ready hardwood surface, a digital scoreboard, and seating for spectators. The arena is climate controlled and ideal for team scrimmages or casual pickup games.

name: Blue Lane Swimming Pool
shortDescription: 25m pool lane reservation with lifeguard coverage.
description: Reserve dedicated lanes for training sessions or technique practice. Blue Lane includes lifeguard supervision, clean changing rooms, and a warm-up area.

name: Lagoon Swimming Pool
shortDescription: Spacious pool with lifeguard supervision and modern facilities.
description: Lagoon Swimming Pool is perfect for recreational swimming and training. It features a spacious design, lifeguard supervision, and clean changing rooms.

name: Pulse Badminton Court
shortDescription: Fast indoor court with anti-glare lighting and easy access.
description: Pulse Badminton Court is optimized for speed and visibility. Anti-glare lighting reduces eye strain, and the non-slip flooring keeps footwork confident even during intense rallies.

name: Ace Badminton Court
shortDescription: Fast indoor court with anti-slip flooring and bright lighting.
description: Ace Badminton Court is optimized for high-speed games with anti-slip flooring and bright lighting. Perfect for competitive rallies and training.
